shortdesc.ph: Occurs each time the SDK receives a video frame and prompts you whether or not to mirror the captured video.

section.p: 如果你希望获取的视频数据已根据 中的旋转信息 rotation 进行旋转，需要在调用 方法时注册该回调。 After you successfully register the video frame observer, the SDK triggers this callback each time it receives a video frame. You need to set whether or not to rotate the video frame in the return value of this callback.
section.note: @note This callback applies to RGBA video data only.

section.title: Returns
